title: Wild, Wet and Wicked
description: Memories might bring them home, but only love’s undertow can make them stay.WildA dark secret has kept Andie away from Whispering Cove until her grandfather is hospitalized. She races home—and straight into the arms of the one man she can’t bear to face.When the prowler Brody catches turns out to be Andie, there is no denying the old spark between them still burns bright. But love may not be enough to defeat her demons.WetTired of city life, celebrity chef Kathleen is looking forward to relaxing in Whispering Cove during her high-school reunion. If only she could avoid the boy she’s never gotten over.When Trent hears she’s in town, he wages all-out seduction. The firestorm of need is still hot. Come morning, Kathleen must decide to leave for another decade…or admit that home is where the heat is.WickedDanica caters to her small-town patients, especially the Whispering Cove grandfathers. But when one of them sends for her high-school crush, all her self-reinvention falters.Travel writer Braydon has no desire to settle down, but when he’s home to check on his grandfather, he discovers Danica is no longer a teenage geek. Erotic sparks fly, but is Braydon home for good…or gone with the next tide?Warning: Add one part high-school reunion, three meddling grandfathers, a few sexy sweet treats. Fold in snuggles, romance and batten-down-the-hatches lovin’. Serve hot and watch the sparks fly. Enjoy!
author: Mackenzie McKade
